name: @magic-sdk/core
description: Core business logic for Magic SDK packages.
author: Fortmatic <team@fortmatic.com> (https://fortmatic.com/)

scripts.dev:main: microbundle watch src/index.ts --target web --format modern,es,cjs --external none
scripts.dev:types: microbundle watch src/index.types.ts --output dist/types/index.js --target web --format modern,es,cjs --external none
scripts.build:types: microbundle build src/index.types.ts --output dist/types/index.js --target web --format modern,es,cjs --external none
